content: You know again, I emphasize this often in these kind of calls, you know if you take a look at our Venture businesses, I think our loans came in just a little over $2 billion for the quarter, of which a huge chunk of thatâs capital call, I mean you know weâve never been a giant capital call and was just a pretty moderate one, but our deposits related to those businesses, both the tech, life sciences and capital call lending are $12.2 billion.
